items.sentence: If you ever hurt Tom, I'm going to hurt you.
The company where Tom works is losing money.
Have I done something to make Tom mad at me?
Do you know what Tom does in his spare time?
How long did it take Tom to paint his house?
What makes you think I was going to see Tom?
Do you think Tom would know how to fix this?
I don't know how to persuade Tom to help us.
My hands turned blue because it was so cold.
This paperweight belonged to my grandfather.
You didn't leave the water running, did you?
I don't think that many people will do that.
I didn't think that Tom would be so worried.
I told Tom it was OK for him to leave early.
Does Tom know when the party is going to be?
People spend about half their life sleeping.
All I want is another three hundred dollars.
Did Tom tell you anything about his new job?
Mary isn't gorgeous, but she's good-looking.
I want to thank the lifeguards who saved me.
